story-moment.PURSUING BUCKY: Mistakenly believing Bucky Barnes was responsible for his father’s death, T’Challa teamed with Iron Man and his allies against Captain America’s rogue team.
story-moment.CHALLENGED BY KILLMONGER: Challenged by the man called Killmonger, T’Challa was nearly killed in combat and left for dead.
story-moment.DEFEATING KILLMONGER: With both Wakanda and the world’s future at stake, T’Challa returned to battle Killmonger for his nation’s throne, ultimately defeating his cousin.
story-moment.BATTLE OF WAKANDA: Agreeing to give aid to Captain America, T’Challa led his people in a hard fought battle against Thanos’ army, as they attempted to invade Wakanda to gain control of Vision and the Mind Stone he possessed.

powers+abilities.HAND-TO-HAND COMBAT: A terrific hand-to-hand combatant, T’Challa is highly skilled in one-on-one fighting, even without the powers of the Black Panther.
powers+abilities.BULLETPROOF COSTUME: Black Panther’s bulletproof costume, designed by his sister Shuri, is stored within his necklace and can envelop T’Challa whenever he wishes.
powers+abilities.VIBRANIUM CLAWS: The Black Panther costume includes very tough and sharp vibranium claws, which can retract back into the gloves.
powers+abilities.ENERGY PULSE: The Black Panther costume absorbs kinetic energy, and then redistributes it, allowing T’Challa to either increase the strength of his kicks and punches, or release all the energy at once in the form of a powerful energy pulse.
